android.en:
Update content
Performance optimization
•Optimized some specific scene freeze problems
•Upgraded to Unity 2018.4.34
Other content
•Fixed known bugs
•Fixed part of the text content
System requirements have changed
•The new version only supports arm64 architecture
•The system requires at least Android 4.4
